nodes.text: Bromlarch was a planet located in the Mid Rim of the galaxy. It was represented in the Galactic Senate by Senator Caelor Gaans. Bromlarch had a planetary aqueduct system that was damaged prior to the Clone Wars. Galactic Republic Senators Padmé Amidala and Rush Clovis both had three nights to rescue Bromlarch's aqueduct system, thus saving the planet from famine.
